source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_SEQ_00<tab>Jammingway is in need of your brains and brawn─mostly the latter.
target: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_SEQ_00<tab>オールド・シャーレアンのジャミングウェイは、冒険者を探していたようだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_SEQ_01<tab>Relieved to see a peerless adventurer such as yourself, Jammingway explains that the reconnaissance automaton they dispatched to Ultima Thule has recently sent a most troubling distress signal. He bids you join him at Thaumazein that, together, you might investigate the matter further.
target: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_SEQ_01<tab>ジャミングウェイは、偵察用サポーターが救難信号を発していると語った。現地調査に向かうため、ラヴィリンソスのタウマゼインで「ジャミングウェイ」と合流しよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_SEQ_02<tab>Your Loporrit companion explains that─for reasons somewhat difficult to wrap the mind around─the <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var> is capable of transporting you to Ultima Thule even without your fueling the aetherburner. A parting gift from Venat, mayhap, or Meteion.
target: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_SEQ_02<tab>ジャミングウェイは一足先に現地へ移動した。ウルティマ・トゥーレの魔導船ラグナロクにいる「ジャミングウェイ」と合流しよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_SEQ_03<tab>Due to─or perhaps in spite of─your ship existing in two places at once, you instantly travel to Ultima Thule without becoming a fine particle mist. The also-intact Jammingway explains that their automaton sent its last transmission from Base Omicron, and requests you follow them there.
target: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_SEQ_03<tab>ジャミングウェイと合流した。救難信号の発信源を辿りオミクロンベースへ向かった「ジャミングウェイ」と話そう

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_SEQ_04<tab>At Base Omicron, you meet the military information and operations Omicron N-7000. It relays a troubling series of events that have led to the reawakening of Stigma-4, a militaristic matrix that now threatens to annihilate your planet. As destroying Stigma-4 would have catastrophic consequences for the Omicrons of Ultima Thule, you settle on an alternate solution─adding the distinct impression of defeat to the war cache in Stigma-4's memory banks so that the matrix might reconsider its optimal course of action.
target: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_SEQ_04<tab>冒険者たちは、オミクロンベースでN-7000と出会い、外星侵略を企てる兵站戦略マトリクス「スティグマ・フォー」が再起動したことを知った。協力して侵略を止めるため、オミクロンベース付近の「N-7000」と合流しよう。

source:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_SEQ_05<tab>N-7000 has opened an access pathway to Stigma-4's memory systems in the form of a virtual environment. Enter the matrix's subconscious and do what you must to defy its aggressive protocols.

※The Stigma Dreamscape can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_SEQ_05<tab>N-7000から、電脳空間で「スティグマ・フォー」を撃破する概要を聞いた。「電脳夢想 スティグマ・フォー」を攻略し、作戦を成功に導こう。

※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_SEQ_06<tab>Your mission appears to have been a resounding success, as you have “destroyed” Stigma-4's virtual core. N-7000 should be able to discern whether this was indeed enough to force the matrix onto a more peaceful path.
target: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_SEQ_06<tab>「スティグマ・フォー」に敗北を認めさせたことで、作戦は成功に終わった。オミクロンベース付近にいる「N-7000」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_SEQ_07<tab>Convinced that its attempt at conquest would end in failure, Stigma-4 ceases its military campaign and is put to work on diplomatic holograms instead. N-7000, however, finds itself without purpose now that peace is here to stay. To prevent it entering eternal sleep mode, Jammingway proposes opening a café as a way to find meaning in life and help others do the same.
target: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_SEQ_07<tab>N-7000と話して、侵略計画が凍結されたことを確認した。しかし同時に、N-7000は未来の指針を失っていたようだ。そんな彼に、ジャミングウェイは奇妙な長期行動計画を立案する。ウルティマ・トゥーレの命なき街へ赴き、「ジャミングウェイ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_SEQ_08<tab>You visit the nekropolis, where an old venue stands ready to become the new café. Here, as Jammingway tells it, they and N-7000 will endeavor to pass on the knowledge of lost civilizations, and inspire hope in those that have fallen to despair. What future awaits them and the countless travelers that will doubtless visit in the years to come?
target: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_SEQ_08<tab>命なき街のカフェスペースを確認した。N-7000とジャミングウェイは、ここで滅亡文明を再現しつつ、カフェの運営を進めていくと語る。宇宙の果てに開かれる、残遺物たちの集うカフェ「ラストレムナント」……その未来は、いかなるものだろうか。

target: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_SEQ_09<tab>

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_TODO_00<tab>Rendezvous with Jammingway in Thaumazein.
target: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_TODO_00<tab>タウマゼインでジャミングウェイと合流

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_TODO_01<tab>Join Jammingway by the <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var> in Ultima Thule.
target: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_TODO_01<tab>魔導船ラグナロクのジャミングウェイと合流

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Jammingway.
target: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_TODO_02<tab>ジャミングウェイと話す

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_TODO_03<tab>Speak with N-7000.
target: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_TODO_03<tab>N-7000と話す

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_TODO_04<tab>Enter the Stigma Dreamscape.
target: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_TODO_04<tab>「電脳夢想 スティグマ・フォー」を攻略

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_TODO_05<tab>Speak with N-7000.
target: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_TODO_05<tab>N-7000と話す

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Jammingway.
target: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_TODO_06<tab>ジャミングウェイと話す

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_001<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! You are <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, yes? Oh, thank you ever so much for coming. In truth, I've been searching all over for you. You see, there is a most pressing matter for which I could use your wisdom and expertise!
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_001<tab>やや、これは<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿！
ここでお会いできるとは、なんという幸運！
相談したいことがあり、アナタを探していたのデス！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_002<tab>Oh, but we haven't actually been introduced yet, have we? The name's Jammingway─I had the honor of serving as the communications officer aboard the <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_002<tab>ええっと、まずは自己紹介が先デスよね。
オイラの名前は、ジャミングウェイ。
魔導船ラグナロクで、情報通信担当を務めていました。

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_003<tab>So anyhow, to the matter I spoke of... It began the other day when my curiosity got the better of me, and I decided to send a reconnaissance probe to Ultima Thule to investigate the environs.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_003<tab>それで、相談というのはデスね……。
実はオイラ、先日ウルティマ・トゥーレに赴いた際に、
周辺を探るため、偵察用サポーターを放っておいたのデスが……

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_004<tab>Imagine my surprise when my robotic friend responded just a short while ago with a most urgent and dire distress signal!
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_004<tab>そのサポーターから、
なんと救難信号が送られてきたのデス！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_005<tab>A distress signal from Ultima Thule? <var 1A 02 /var>Now<var 1A 01 /var>, even after you and your companions mercifully put an end to the threat of the Final Days? Surely this intrigues and worries you as much as it does me.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_005<tab>終焉を謳うものの討滅に成功したとはいえ、
ウルティマ・トゥーレからの救難信号……
気になるデスよね？

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_006<tab>I was just about to venture there to investigate further, but there's no telling what dangers might await─and I am a communications officer, not an adventurer. Please join me at Thaumazein, so we may boldly go where you have gone before!
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_006<tab>そんなわけで、オイラは現地調査を行いたいのデス！
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、もし同行いただけるようでしたら、
ラヴィリンソスの「タウマゼイン」にいらしてくださいデス！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_010<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I knew you'd come! Clearly, we have inquiring minds and a crushing need to be of use in common!
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_010<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿！
さっそく来ていただけたんデスね、オイラうれしいデス！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_011<tab>Anyroad, I'm pleased to report that the <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var> has already been prepared for our journey─a journey that, fortunately, will not require the massive quantities of aether that were necessary for our previous voyage beyond the stars.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_011<tab>すでに「ラグナロク」の準備は完了しているのデス！
初航海の際と違って、莫大なエーテルは必要としませんから、
その点もご安心くださいデス！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_012<tab>How can this be, you wonder? Hells if I know! Whether it is a parting gift from Mother, or perhaps the manifestation of Meteion's true desire, this vessel is strongly connected to Ultima Thule.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_012<tab>ヴェーネス様の標のおかげか、
あるいはメーティオンの願いなのかは定かではありませんが、
この船は、今もウルティマ・トゥーレと強く結びついてるんデス。

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_013<tab>So strongly, in fact, that it somehow simultaneously exists in both locations─here in Labyrinthos, and out at the edge of the universe.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_013<tab>つまり、この船はラヴィリンソスに在ると同時に、
ウルティマ・トゥーレにも在るんデスよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_014<tab>Is this making more sense to you now? No? Well, it matters little. What matters is that we get to the other side and see what is troubling my dearest probe. On that note, let us be off!
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_014<tab>どういうことか、わからないデスか？
まぁ、その点は向こうに行けばわかることデスよ。
さっそく向かいましょう！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_020<tab>See? The <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var> exists here as surely as it did─and does─back in Labyrinthos.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_020<tab>どうデス？
本当にこっちにもラグナロクが在るでしょう？

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_021<tab>With the vessel forming a conduit of sorts, we may also easily teleport between the two locations. Convenient, wouldn't you say?
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_021<tab>この船が起点になっているおかげで、
「テレポ」などの転移魔法も機能しているというわけデス。

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_022<tab>Precisely because the locations are so indelibly connected to each other, however, I fear that whatever has triggered my probe's distress signal has the potential to threaten Labyrinthos as well. And so I would investigate without delay!
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_022<tab>それだけ強い結びつきがあるからこそ、
例の救難信号が気になるところなんデスが……。
とにかく、発信源を確認してみましょう。

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_023<tab>Let's see, now... It would seem the distress signal is coming from Base Omicron, not far from here. Let us hope my automaton friend can enlighten us further as to the situation.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_023<tab>えーっと、発信源は……
報告にあった機械集落「オミクロンベース」の方デスね。
さあ、偵察用サポーターの行方を捜しましょう……！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_030<tab><whirr> Reading database... Organic life-form identified as <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Initiating standard greeting protocol... Hail, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_030<tab>ガガガ……データベースと照合。
個体名<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>と認識……。

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_031<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! This is my precious reconnaissance automaton. And yet, it would appear this good-for-nothing bucket of bolts has gotten its oily paws all over it. Pray stand by for a moment while I give it a good talking to.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_031<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿、サポーターを見つけたデス！
でも、このポンコツが勝手にいじってたみたいで……。
オイラ抗議するので、見守っていてほしいのデス！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_032<tab>You miserable sack of sockets! What in the heavens' name do you think you're doing with my oh-so-valuable automaton!?
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_032<tab>や、やい、このポンコツめ！
オイラたちのサポーターを盗むとは、どういうつもりデスか！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_033<tab><whirr> Completing logic circuits. N-7000 categorically denies the accusations of this hirsute organism.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_033<tab>ガガガ……
毛むくじゃら有機生命体による非合理的な非難を、
全面的に否定します。

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_034<tab>An advanced life-form such as N-7000 has no need for such outdated technology. On the contrary, this unit took pity on this makeshift machine and the primitive society which created it, and deigned to issue a warning.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_034<tab>そもそも、このような原始的機械に盗む価値などありません。
当機「N-7000」は友好的行為として、
このガラクタを作り出した文明に、警告を発したのです……！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_035<tab>Primitive? Outdated!? I'll show you primitive and outdated, you...
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_035<tab>ムキー！
ガラクタとは失礼な……！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_100_035<tab>...Wait. What is this warning you speak of?
target: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_100_035<tab>……しかし、警告とはどういう意味なのデス？

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_036<tab><whirr> Initiating simplification... To explain in imprecise terms that your crude mind might comprehend, some time after the organic life-form known as <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> here came in contact with M-017, the Omicrons noticed an irregularity.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_036<tab>毛むくじゃら有機生命体の低い知能レベルに合わせて説明します。
そちらの有機生命体、個体名<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>が、
M-017と接触した後、しばらくして……

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_037<tab>Specifically, a powerful burst of energy from the remnants of a lost world.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_037<tab>我々は、当宙域中心にある廃星殻レムナントより、
強力なエネルギー波の放出を検出しました。

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_038<tab>No doubt a reaction to <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> companions defeating the Endsinger!
target: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_038<tab>終焉を謳うものを討滅したときの反応デスね……！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_039<tab>Fortunately, the energy wave itself caused no appreciable damage. Less fortunately, it housed within it an encoded message from the strategic matrix known as “Stigma-1.”
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_039<tab>問題は、そのエネルギー波に、
戦争戦略マトリクス「スティグマ・ワン」のコードを用いた、
命令データが含まれていたことです。

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_040<tab>The message contained a single word─a single command. “Live.”
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_040<tab>命令は、ひとつ。
ただ「生きろ」と。

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_041<tab>...That seems innocent enough. What ever is the problem?
target: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_041<tab>それが事実だとして、何が問題だっていうんデスか？

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_042<tab>This message reached the sensors of Stigma-4, a logistics matrix that has long lain dormant. Shocked back to life at the behest of its fellow intelligence, it has resumed its duties in constructing weapons of mass destruction.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_042<tab>この生存命令を受けて、長らく休眠状態を維持していた、
兵站戦略マトリクス「スティグマ・フォー」が起動したのです。
同機は、外征に要する兵器や物資の、製造を司る存在……

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_043<tab>Furthermore, there is a statistical probability of 99% that it will launch a full-scale assault on your eminently detectible home planet as soon as production is complete.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_043<tab>このままスティグマ・フォーを放置すれば、
新たな侵略兵器が製造され、アナタ方の星にも放たれるでしょう。

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_Q1_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_A1_000_001<tab>Can't produce weapons if you're exploded!
target: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_A1_000_001<tab>今すぐスティグマ・フォーを破壊しよう

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_A1_000_002<tab>Perhaps we can remove its power source somehow.
target: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_A1_000_002<tab>今すぐスティグマ・フォーを停止させよう

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_044<tab>This unit projects that this would be less than ideal. Stigma-4's production capabilities are necessary to ensure that the Omicrons' existence is maintained in perpetuity. Disabling or destroying it is incompatible with the command issued by Stigma-1.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_044<tab>ガガガ……破壊も停止も容認できません。
当機を含むオミクロンが生存命令を実行し続けるには、
スティグマ・フォーの製造能力が不可欠と考えられるのです。

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_045<tab>Is there no way we might simply...change its mind? If Stigma-4 is convinced that war is essential to its survival, could we not persuade it that an unprovoked offensive might threaten its existence even more?
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_045<tab>でしたら、そのスティグマ・フォーの決定を覆せばいいのでは？
侵略兵器を造り始めたのが、生存命令に従うためだとしたら、
侵略が滅亡に繋がると信じ込ませればいいのデス！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_046<tab>The grubby organic life-form's proposition has merit. As a military information and operations specialist, this unit does possess the capability to rewrite the memory banks of other artificial intelligences.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_046<tab>ガガガ……毛むくじゃら有機生命体の提案に価値を認めます。
情報戦のために製造された当機の能力を以てすれば、
スティグマ・フォーの記憶を改竄可能……。

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_047<tab>If this unit were to hack Stigma-4's neural core and implant the memory that such an offensive once led not to victory, but to failure and near eradication, it must logically conclude that preemptive attack is ill-advised.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_047<tab>過去に行われた侵略行動の記憶を、
勝利ではなく敗北に終わったと改竄すれば、決定は覆るでしょう。

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_048<tab>To accomplish this, this unit will access Stigma-4 and use a dimensional manipulator to generate a virtual environment simulating its memories of war. You must traverse the environment and nullify Stigma-4's expectations of victory.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_048<tab>ですが、そのためにはスティグマ・フォーにアクセスし、
「次元」操作能力で、侵略の記憶に基づいた特殊空間を生成……。
その中に侵入して、勝利を掴む強力な戦闘体が必要です。

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_049<tab>That sounds simple and not at all likely to get us killed! What do you say, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_049<tab>それなら問題ないデス！
ねっ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿？

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_Q2_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_A2_000_001<tab>Leave the fighting to us.
target: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_A2_000_001<tab>任せておけ！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_A2_000_002<tab>I suppose it's worth a try...
target: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_A2_000_002<tab>やれるだけのことはやってみます……

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_A2_000_003<tab>It can't be any tougher than Omega, right? Right!
target: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_A2_000_003<tab>オメガなら倒したことがある！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_050<tab>Commencing strategic operations protocol... All participants in the mission, please accompany this unit to the access point at once.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_050<tab>ガガガ……アナタ方を同盟者と認定……
これより共同で、スティグマ・フォー記憶改竄作戦を発動します。
直ちにアクセスポイントに案内しましょう。

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_060<tab>I can't say I <var 1A 02 /var>completely<var 1A 01 /var> understand what's going on here...but at least it's progress, yes?
target: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_060<tab>なんだか妙な流れになってきたデスね……。

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_061<tab>From this access point, it will be possible for this unit to establish a communications interface with Stigma-4's neural network.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_061<tab>ガガガ……この施設が、
スティグマ・フォーとの通信が可能なアクセスポイントです。

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_062<tab>You may be interested to know that this is the first time this unit has been able to perform its intended function since the day it was commissioned. This unit is honored, and will do its utmost to maximize the probability of success.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_062<tab>当機が製造されて初めて訪れた、情報戦の機会……
存在意義を果たすべく、必ずや作戦を成功させてみせましょう。

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_063<tab>Er, are you saying that you've never actually done this before? You really had me going with your “advanced intelligence” talk, but at least my probe had work experience!
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_063<tab>そ、それって、初めての実戦ってことデスか？
まさか本当にポンコツだったとは……！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_064<tab>The flea-ridden life-form's evaluation is inaccurate. This unit is equipped with dynamic functionality. It simply has not encountered technology formidable enough to require its full capabilities before.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_064<tab>毛むくじゃら有機生命体に対し、
当機は、優れた情報戦能力を有していると反論します。
当機の能力が必要なほどの文明と交戦したことがないだけです。

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_065<tab>More significantly, this unit has succeeded in establishing the interface with Stigma-4. All that remains is for you to enter the simulation and use whatever puny weapons are at your disposal to destroy the core that lies within. That should see the matrix sufficiently traumatized.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_065<tab>すでにスティグマ・フォーへの強制接続は完了しています。
あとは、「次元」操作技術により再現した記憶領域に侵入し、
目標のコアユニットを追い詰めて破壊するのみ！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_066<tab>This unit will remain in this physical space to ensure the communication interface remains stable as you carry out the operation. And do take care─though the environment is virtual, any pain you suffer within will feel quite real.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_066<tab>さあ、同盟者<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、
当機による完璧な情報支援を信じ、作戦行動を開始してください！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_067<tab>Good luck in there, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! And don't worry...I'll be keeping a close eye on this hunk of scrap metal to make sure it doesn't mess anything up.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_067<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿、
このポンコツのことは、オイラがしっかり見張っておくデス！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_068<tab>This unit wishes you success, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Your planet is so quaint─it would be a shame if Stigma-4 were to reduce it to cold, lifeless debris.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_068<tab>さあ、同盟者<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、
当機による完璧な情報支援を信じ、作戦行動を開始してください！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_070<tab>Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I knew you could do it! N-7000 and I were monitoring your progress the entire way!
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_070<tab>作戦成功デスね！
こちらからモニターしていましたが、手に汗握る戦いでした！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_STIGMA4_000_071<tab>Awaiting orders...
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_STIGMA4_000_071<tab>オミクロンN-7000からの要請に基づき、
ホログラム体を生成中……。

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_072<tab>Operation status: success. Stigma-4 has abandoned its military offensive.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_072<tab>ガガガ……同盟者<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、
当機は本作戦の成功を確認しました。
スティグマ・フォーは現在、交渉用ホログラム体を現出中です。

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_100_072<tab>N-7000 submits new orders to Stigma-4. Stigma-4 is instructed to immediately cease production of all weapons and attack units, and initiate production of diplomatic hologram units.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_100_072<tab>ガガガ……現時刻をもって、
当機は、兵站戦略マトリクス「スティグマ・フォー」に、
侵略兵器の製造中止を正式要請します！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_STIGMA4_000_073<tab>Analysis of memory data complete. Further pursuit of planned invasion is calculated to have a 99.9999924634% probability of resulting in utter annihilation. N-7000's orders are deemed strategically and logistically sound. Reconfiguring production infrastructure...
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_STIGMA4_000_073<tab>記憶データに基づいて、要請の正当性を判断。
侵略行動は敗北に繋がり、生存命令に反すると認定……
直ちに侵略兵器の製造を中断する。

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_074<tab>Take that, glowing eyeball!
target: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_074<tab>や、やったー！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_075<tab>Oh, my dearest N-7000! I apologize for all those times I called you a sack of bolts. Why, you're the most impressive military information and operations unit I've ever met!
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_075<tab>N-7000殿、
ポンコツと罵ったことを、お詫びしておくデス！
情報戦のスペシャリストだと認めるデスよ！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_076<tab>This unit expresses its gratitude to the hero <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and the soft-looking organic life-form. This unit could not have succeeded without your help.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_076<tab>ガガガ……同盟者<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、
ついでに毛むくじゃら有機生命体にも感謝を……。

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_077<tab>This also marks the completion of this unit's duties. With the invasion halted indefinitely, there remains no military operation or conflict requiring this unit's functions. Preparing to shut down and enter permanent energy-saving hibernation...
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_077<tab>しかし、侵略行動が停止された今、情報戦を専門とする当機は、
もう永遠に存在意義を果たせる機会がなくなりました。
かくなる上は自我をシャットダウンし、省エネルギーモードで……

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_078<tab>Shut down? What nonsense is this? Did you not receive an order to <var 1A 02 /var>live<var 1A 01 /var> just a short time ago!? Eternal sleep doesn't sound like <var 1A 02 /var>living<var 1A 01 /var> to me!
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_078<tab>前言撤回デス、このポンコツ！
「生きろ」という意味を、何だと思ってるんデスか！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_079<tab>Come on, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Say something and set this bolt head straight, won't you?
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_079<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿も、
ひとこと言ってやってくださいデス！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_Q3_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_A3_000_001<tab>Why not put your abilities to work for peace?
target: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_A3_000_001<tab>情報戦の能力を、希望のために使え！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_A3_000_002<tab>To shut down would be inconsistent with the order Sir gave you.
target: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_A3_000_002<tab>自我を手放すのは、生存命令に反する！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_080<tab><var 08 E905 ((She's)) ((He's)) /var> right! You were told to live, and live is what you'll do! If you don't have a war to wage anymore, you can use your talents to bring in a new future of peace and hope.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_080<tab>そのとおりデス！
アナタたちのマスターが「生きろ」と命じたのは、
誰かに希望を伝え、未来に歩むことの意義を認識したからデス！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_081<tab><whirr> ...But what are the appropriate protocols? This unit possesses little practical experience in peacetime operations.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_081<tab>ガガガ……たとえそうだとして、
当機の情報戦能力が、何の役に立つというのでしょう？

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_082<tab>You can access Stigma-4, can you not? By interfacing with its memory banks, might you not be able to...say, find knowledge of lost civilizations? Civilizations that you might simulate for the edification of those who live now?
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_082<tab>アナタは、スティグマ・フォーを操れるはずデス！
記憶データから、あれだけの再現ができるのであれば、
滅亡文明を再現して蘇らせることだってできるはずでしょう！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_083<tab>Indeed...such a task would be within this unit's capabilities. But what about when that task is complete? Without an ongoing mission, sooner or later this unit is bound to lose its purpose. What happens then?
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_083<tab>仮に滅亡文明を再現したとして……
その作業が終われば、またもや当機は存在意義を失います。
その後に何をすればいいのでしょう？

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_084<tab>Well, let's see, now... I suppose you could always...open a café?
target: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_084<tab>…………カフェを、開くのデス！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_085<tab>Back in Old Sharlayan, there's a fine establishment called the “Last Stand.” People gather there to share food, drink, company─and reasons to meet again.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_085<tab>オールド・シャーレアンの街にあるカフェ「ラストスタンド」で、
オイラは人々が集い、食を楽しみ、語らう姿を見たのデス。
そうして、ヒトは希望を伝えているのデス！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_086<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> delivered <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> world from the brink of despair, and helped people dream of a brighter future once more. What if we could do the same for the other civilizations Meteion found?
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_086<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>たちは、絶望に打ち勝った！
その希望を、絶望の中で滅亡した文明に伝えるのデス！
メーティオンが確認した、すべての滅亡文明に対して……！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_087<tab>This unit finds the furry life-form's suggestion...<whirr>...difficult to process.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_087<tab>ガガガ……毛むくじゃら有機生命体の提案は、
実に意味不明です。

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_088<tab>And yet, realizing accurate simulations of myriad civilizations─including those the Omicrons have not encountered─would undoubtedly challenge this unit to the fullest. It is a reason to remain active for the foreseeable future.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_088<tab>しかし、我々が遭遇したもの以外の文明まで再現するとなると、
高度な情報処理能力が求められるであろうと認められます。
長期間、当機は存在意義を保持できるでしょう。

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_089<tab>Precisely! See? I knew I was onto something here!
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_089<tab>そうでしょうとも！
我ながら、面白いことを思いついてワクワクしてきたデス！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_090<tab>Speaking of “here”─<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, do you know anywhere nearby that could use a good café?
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_090<tab>ところで<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿、
この辺りで、カフェを作れそうな場所はないものでしょうか？

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_091<tab>There's an empty structure that might be suited for it in the nekropolis? Well, why didn't you say so sooner?
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_091<tab>ほうほう、「命なき街」に良さげな場所が！
善は急げ……さっそく向かってみるのデス！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_100<tab>This unit has taken the liberty of accessing Stigma-4 and simulating a highly advanced war machine from Gordhona. Do take care not to be annihilated.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_100<tab>さっそく、スティグマ・フォーにアクセスして、
我々が滅ぼしたゴードナ文明の機械兵器を再現しました。

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_STIGMA4_000_101<tab>Analysis indicates that in order to obey the primary directive, “Live,” it will be necessary to establish cooperation with other civilizations.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_STIGMA4_000_101<tab>生存命令に従うため、異星文明との友好的対話が必要と判断。
N-7000からの要請に従い、異文明体の再現を開始します。

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_GODONAGARDIAN_000_102<tab>Initializing café security system... Defenses engaged.
target: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_GODONAGARDIAN_000_102<tab>カフェ警護システム起動……。

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_103<tab>Well, would you look at that... A spacious counter, outdoor seating─and a fine layer of homey grey dust!
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_103<tab>ふんふん、客席もあればカウンターもある……
カフェに最適な場所じゃないデスか！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_104<tab>Best of all is the view of that massive dead star that Meteion was lurking in for ages, looming ominously overhead! People are going to <var 1A 02 /var>love<var 1A 01 /var> this.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_104<tab>なにより眺望がいい！
絶望に染まったメーティオンたちが巣にした廃星殻、
レムナントが一望できる点が最高デス！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_105<tab>Think about it─it's poetic. The very place where hope was nearly extinguished forevermore, now a beacon of it!
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_105<tab>かつて絶望の象徴であった場所を眺めながら、
今この地には希望があるのだと語らうのデス！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_106<tab>This unit has still not fully processed the concept of a “café,” but will simulate elements of lost civilizations as its ongoing mission.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_106<tab>それでは提案どおり、当機はスティグマ・フォーと協力し、
滅亡文明のデータを解析……再現体を作っていきましょう。
しかし、カフェとやらの概念が理解できません。

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_107<tab>That'll be just fine, N-7000. You focus on what you do best, and leave the rest to me. I'll have you know I learned a thing or two about preparing and serving victuals and beverages in my time at the Last Stand.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_107<tab>その点はオイラにお任せデス！
「ラストスタンド」に滞在していた経験を活かして、
オイラがカフェを運営してみせるデス！

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_108<tab>Not to mention that I've come up with the perfect name for our new establishment─the “Last Dregs”! An inspiring moniker, wouldn't you say?
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_108<tab>名付けてカフェ「ラストレムナント」！
どうデス、最高の店名でしょう？

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_109<tab>This unit is unable to process this statement. It must defer to the furry life-form's judgment.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_N7000_000_109<tab>当機には理解不能です。
しかし、カフェを知る毛むくじゃら有機生命体が、
そう言うのであれば、最高なのでしょう。

source: TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_110<tab>I'll take that as a “yes”! Now, we had best get to work─there are many preparations to be made before we're ready to open for business. You're more than welcome any time, though, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! ...Oh, and please tell the other Loporrits I'm not dead.
target:
TEXT_AKTKYX201_04168_JAMMINGWAY_000_110<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿、本当にありがとうございました！
オイラは、このポンコツとしばらくカフェ作りをやってみるデス！
だから、たまには遊びに来てほしいのデスよ！
